text.section:
An employer shall give to each employee:
at the time of hiring, notice of:
the rate of pay of the employee;
the regular paydays that the employer sets; and
leave benefits;
for each pay period, a statement of the gross earnings of the employee and deductions from those gross earnings; and
at least 1 pay period in advance, notice of any change in a payday or wage.
This section does not prohibit an employer from increasing a wage without advance notice.
